about.competencies:
AI Product Strategy, Machine Learning Operations, Cross-functional Team Leadership, Enterprise Solution Architecture, Regulatory Compliance Systems

At Tapway, I led the development of enterprise AI vision platforms, scaling from startup to serving 10+ major enterprise clients. This experience taught me that successful AI products require not just technical sophistication, but deep understanding of enterprise needs and cultural contexts. mote and find 

Currently, as an Entrepreneur in Residence at Antler Malaysia, I'm building AI compliance solutions for the fintech sector, having secured $110K+ in early funding. My focus remains on creating AI products that are both technically robust and culturally intelligent.
about.philosophyQuote: AI product success isn't just about cutting-edge technologyâ€”it's about understanding cultural nuances, regulatory landscapes, and human needs across diverse markets. True innovation happens when we bridge technical excellence with deep market empathy.
